articles.title: Deiveson Figueiredo has a ‘personal’ issue with Brandon Moreno: ‘I think I’m going to destroy him’ - MMA Fighting
articles.description: Deiveson Figueiredo is fired up about a potential fight against Brandon Moreno in December, although he’s upset that the UFC didn’t reward him with a post-fight bonus at UFC 255.
articles.content:
Deiveson Figueiredo is already fired up about his next title defense.
